title: How does MMR work ?
body:
Hey !
I just wanted to know how it does work because I just won a ranked game with Shen and now I'm in Hot Streak (I think that's the word Riot use) and some website tell me that my MMR dropped to 1093, while it was around 1120 before so I don't really understand
(yeah I'm a bronze (3 if ya want to know))
But anyway it doesn't really matter does it ?

replies.body: A player's MMR is hidden and unknown, so any third party websites that you're looking at are giving you their best guess and is not an accurate representation.  Your placement is a solid indicator, and as you continue to climb you will also begin to find tougher matches because matchmaking works to place you against players of similar skills.  If you have any questions, feel free to check out our [matchmaking ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752954-Matchmaking-Guide)guide or ask on the [gameplay ](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-balance)boards.  Good luck!

Oh alright thanks for the answer and the links that's nice :D
I guess i should be more pragmatic sometimes :P
